description:
In the distant past in a faraway land, http://anidb.net/ch9830 [Yuushi] is a 17-year-old girl that has been put under a spell - her body stopped aging ever since she was ten years old. Cheerful and optimistic, Yuushi doesn`t let the spell bother her. Especially because Yuushi has been selected as a candidate to become the next Petite Pri Princess. The girl selected to be princess will receive a magical tiara which grants the wearer anything she wants. This means that if Yuushi becomes princess she can wish her spell away! But the competition is stiff and Yuushi still looks like a 10-year-old girl.
Source: AnimeNfo

REGULAR.description:
The story starts with a young knight discovering an infant. Seventeen years later the infant now all grown up or is she? Yucie now 17 still looks like a 10 year old. Why her body stopped growing is a mystery. Its her birthday and to avoid her father and the big feast he`s preparing she goes to town. She learns of a test by the queen, a test to find the queen, but can`t enter because she`s too young. She see a mysterious light and later learns its the Eternal Tiara an object said to make any wish come true. With the help of Cube she enters the castle and finds the Tiara. The queen makes her an offical Platinum Princess Candidate. Will Yucie have what it takes to become the next princess? Her adventure is just beginning!
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A New Platinum Princess Candidate
Tanjou! Platinum Princess Kouho
誕生! プラチナプリンセス候補

REGULAR.description:
It`s Yucie`s first day at the Princess Academy and just as things were looking good Lady Glenda the Princess of the Demon World makes her big entrance. Her goal? To rule the world by using the Eternal Tiara as a way to wish and gain complete control of the planet! Like Yucie she also finds herself stuck in a body that is physically much younger than she is in reality. Despite sharing this situation with Yucie the two quickly become rivals and end up pitted against each other in a contest that will decide who stays and who leaves the Princess Academy! Who will win!?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: A Rival? Yucie Goes to School
Rival Toujou! Yuushi, Gakkou e Iku
ライバル登場! ユーシィ, 学校へ行く

REGULAR.description:
As part of their training to become the Platinum Princess each of the students must take up a part time job so that they can interact with people they typically would not run into in their everyday lives. As their first assignment Yucie, Cocoloo and Glenda take up helper positions at a nearby confectionary shop. What will happen when all three girls end up working together!?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Doki Doki! Hajimete no Arubaito!
Exciting First Job
ドキドキ! 初めてのアルバイト!

REGULAR.description:
As their second job assignment the girls end up with the task of babysitting some babies, but when Yucie discovers that she will be in charge of a strange non-human baby will she be up to the task?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Doushiyou? Kedama Panic!
What`ll I Do?! Hairball Panic
どうしよう? 毛玉パニック!

REGULAR.description:
Yucie takes on her most challenging part time job yet as she joins a flower garden and is put in charge of helping grow this season`s flowers. This may be too hard for our petite princess! Hang in there Yucie!
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Memories... A Garden from a Time Far Away
Memory...... Tooi Hi no Hanazono
メモリー...... 遠い日の花園

REGULAR.description:
Yucie is sent off to watch a church overnight while the residing sister is away, she ends up having Glenda show as well as Cocoloo. Glenda ends up leaving on Demon related business but the two girls stay and eventually have to deal with the arrival of a tired young man seeking refuge. There`s concern all around until the young man actually wakes up and acts like king of the castle and keeps referring to Yucie as Forehead. As it turns out, for some unknown reason he`s on the run from the castle guards who won`t say why they`re after him. The actual sister of the church opts to take care of him until he`s ready to go, which doesn`t take long as he`s after the local dragon. Finding that Yucie knows about him, she`s dragged deeper into things but there`s something about him she can`t quite shake. The episode plays out much like a good fantasy episode with dragons, cerebeus and big fight scenes, but for Yucie she finds herself feeling like she did when the prince years ago rescued her in the these same woods.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Could It Be Him? The Encounter Comes Without Notice
Moshikashite!? Deai wa Totsuzen Yatte Kita
もしかして!? 出会いは突然やってきた

REGULAR.description:
Yucie and Glenda are sent off to find the next crystal flower. With the help of Gaga, the two are sent into the Demon World where they have to work together and figure it out with no real help. For Glenda, returning to the Demon World puts her firmly in her element, but not as she`d like. For Yucie, it`s seeing all those things you normally fear being brought to reality. Unfortunately for both, the Demon Realm isn`t what it used to be by a long stretch. One of the reasons Glenda wants to take over in this world is that her father is set on a remodeling project of the entire world that`ll make it more tourist friendly. So things like the evil looking range of mountains have blue bows and candies across it. The sky has pastel flowers littered through it. It`s just far too cute. And even getting to meet the lord of the demon world is amusing since he`s thrown his back out while doing all the redecorating.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Nyan to? Makai wa Neko Gakari
Oh, Meow? The Demon World Is Full of Cats
ニャンと? 魔界はネコばかり

REGULAR.description:
Today we meet Chawoo. A ghost that happens to be Cocoloo`s steward. A famous artist comes to the academy to look for his next inspiration, his hunt for a model upsets everyone over being rejected. Then he chooses Cocoloo as his model. In the end its also discovered that she too is a Platinum Princess Candidate.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Kirameite, Watashi no Naka no Watashi
Sparkle, the Me Within Myself
きらめいて, 私の中のワタシ

REGULAR.description:
Elmina is the daughter of heaven. She`s not entirely that bright in some ways and sometimes comes off as a snob. Glenda instantly hates her mostly cause of the rivalry between the heaven and the demon world. However everytime Glenda points an accusing finger at her Elmina assumes she`s talking to someone else. It seems she also is a Platium Princess Canidate and is having a little trouble adjusting to Earth since she`s not allowed to use her wings. Her arrival also corresponds with parents day. Both Glenda and Yucie are both freaked out by this. Both for different reasons. Will their parents embarrass them as they fear? Will they survive Parent`s Night?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Perfect? Tenkai no Hime Arawaru!
Perfection? Enter the Princess of Heaven
パーフェクト? 天界の姫現る!

REGULAR.description:
Glenda, Yucie and Cocoloo are working in the library with Rosa for a while; Glenda seems to think the glasses she`s wearing make her look more mature. While Yucie is off on her own she runs into Arc who is looking for something and seems to be being hunted down by Rosa. Will Yucie and her friends go against a facility member and help Arc escape?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Is It Destiny? The Library Reencounter
Unmei? Saikai no Library
運命? 再会のライブラリー

REGULAR.description:
Yucie, Glenda, and Cocoloo are getting a little overloaded from all their oddjobs and Cube, always being the caring guy he is, arranges for them to go on a vacation. When their fun is just beginning, Yucie finds a mysterious girl who has a fascination with the water. Just who....or WHAT....is she?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Omoi wa Todoku, Nagisa de Deatta Shoujo
Thoughts Will Get There: The Girl I Met at the Beach
思いは届く 渚で出会った少女

REGULAR.description:
The girls are looking for the Crystal Flower of 3. Elmina`s father does not tolerate failure in one obstacle to another. But that may change soon.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Challenge! Heaven Triathlon
Chousen! Tenkai Triathlon
挑戦! 天界トライアスロン

REGULAR.description:
Glenda is acting quite unlike her regular aggressive self, she`s IN LOVE! It seems a young man has been able to melt the Princess of Hell`s heart and she is willing to do anything it takes to become his wife, but are her dreams just that? Yucie and Elmina seem to think so after they make a discovery about Glenda`s crush.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Romance! Koi no Mahou wa Totsuzen ni
Romance! The Magic of Love Arrives Without Notice
ロマンス! 恋の魔法は突然に

REGULAR.description:
After becoming a Plantinum Princess Canidate for half a year, the girls are ordered to do a Seine of Light ceremony. But while they are in the forest, the candidates get lost.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Nazo Mata Nazo! Youseikai no Princess
One Mystery After Another! The Fairy World Princess
謎また謎! 妖精界のプリンセス

REGULAR.description:
The girls are spending the day with a kindergarten class, on the first day of their Platinum Princess Curriculum. The young boy that Yucie is stuck with, makes Glenda look like an angel with his behavior though.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Petite Princesses Reborn! New Tasks
Shinsei Petite Pri! Aratanaru Kadai
新生ぷちぷり! 新たなる課題

REGULAR.description:
It`s a special time in the village Yucie and her friends live in, it`s a bit like Halloween; Glenda dresses up like her mother, Cocoloo dresses up like an angel, Elmina doesn`t dress up at all, and Yucie dresses up as a cat. The festival doesn`t start for some time and yet, who should show up but Arc? Remembering what happened between them, Yucie, with some last minute encouragement from her friends, tries to tell Arc how she feels about him.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Harvest Festival: Yucie`s Decision
Shuukakusai, Yuushi no Ketsui!
収穫祭 ユーシィの決意!

REGULAR.description:
The girls are off on a quest for in search of a Crystal Flower. But this time in Fairy World. But it won`t be quite as easy as the candidates for Platinum Princess think.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: How Annoying! The Fairy World Is Full of Lies
Oomeiwaku! Youseikai wa Uso Darake
大迷惑! 妖精界はウソだらけ

REGULAR.description:
When an odd job proves too dangerous for Yucie and the other girls, Cube and Gaga go down into Hades, the land of the demons. But soon they find themselves outnumbered by an army of robots and even Glenda is worried for the traitors life as well as the life of Gaga. Barizan falls ill and, since the girls can`t do anything about it, Cube recruits himself, Chawoo and Gaga to go inside the robot from heaven. Once inside, Cube and his team meet an old "enemy" and some mini enemies. Just how will this end?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Blazing Souls of Stewards! Save Balizan
Moero Shitsuji Tamashii! Balizan o Sukue
燃えろ執事魂! バリザンを救え

REGULAR.description:
Elmina is currently doing housekeeping perfectly at the Rockwell`s residence. But Rockwell is a very harsh and stubborn person. So it will eventually order the length of his care.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Gohoushi Shimasu! Goshujin-sama wa Henkutsu-sama
We`re Here to Serve You! The Master Is a Mr. Stubborn
ご奉仕します! ご主人様はヘンクツ様

REGULAR.description:
Prince Arc and Yucie have a night together during the night of a ball.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Confession! A Ball for Two
Kokuhaku! Futari Kiri no Butoukai
告白! 二人きりの舞踏会

REGULAR.description:
The Platinum Princess Candidates are putting together a very large event - The Concert of Song. Unfortunately, the girls aren`t working so good together.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: All Together! A Song to Join Their Hearts
Zen`in Shuugou! Kokoro o Tsunagu Utagoe
全員集合! 心をつなぐ歌声

REGULAR.description:
The girls arrive at a ghost town to retrieve the last Crystal Flower. But there seems to be a bit of trouble, also there might be a clue to where the Crystal Flower might be.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Mieru? Mienai! Yuurei Yashiku e Irasshai
Visible? Invisible? Welcome to the Haunted House
見える? 見えない! 幽霊屋敷へいらっしゃい

REGULAR.description:
The girls who have now found all of the Crystal Flowers, insert it inside the hands with the Spiritual World. Five people inform about a crisis about the Fairy Boundary. But there`s a creepy tree that`s blasting the world there.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: To the Fairy World... Light Up Those Five Souls
Youseikai e...... Kagayaku Itsutsu no Kokoro!
妖精界へ...... 輝け5つの心!
Graduation... Thoughts Kept Within
Sotsugyou...... Mune ni Himeta Omoi!
卒業...... 胸に秘めた思い!

REGULAR.description:
Everyone figures out Yucie`s new wish is to save Arc. They chose to let Yucie have it, but will Yucie accept? Especially after Queen Ercell arrives to tell them that there is a price that the losers must face. Will Yucie still agree to become the Platinum Princess after she learns of this?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Final Scene! Princess Selection
Saigo no Scene! Princess no Sentaku
最後のセーヌ! プリンセスの選択

REGULAR.description:
Yucie, now the Platinum Princess, rushes to save Arc. Soon after it`s discovered that her memories of her now-lost friends have been erased...or have they? Yucie soon realizes that she has lost something important, something precious to her. She just doesn`t know what that is. Will Yucie be able to get get back what she lost?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Itsuka Otona ni Naru Watashi e
To the Me Who Will Eventually Be an Adult
いつか大人になる私へ
Ending
Ending 2
Opening

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

titles.title: Petite Pri Yuushi
Pequeña Princesa Yucie
Petite Princess Yucie
יושי הנסיכה הקסומה
ぷちぷり*ユーシィ
小公主優希
PPY
Petit Puri Yucie
Puchi Puri Yuushi
